trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Beaumont
There were no other sightings in Beaumont on or around February 27th 2002
divs: Sighting Details My children and I were driving home from BeaumontTX travelling West on IH-10 just before sunset when I noticed a light off in thedistance toward the NW just above tree level. I told my kids to watch itthinking it was an airplane.......however, it never moved........never went outof site......just stayed in the same place.....I dont believe it was a starbecause it was still daylight in that area, and once it was dark it was nolonger there.
Summary: saw lighted object just before sunset
